channel.title: R on Consulting Statistician
channel.description: Recent content in R on Consulting Statistician

item.title: Week_30: Movie Profit
item.description: Movie Profit, Not So Profit This is my second post on Tidy Tuesday and the data-set in question is Movie profit data-set. Even though the title of data says Movie profit I am going to focus on the movies which did not generate any revenue domestic and suggest on gross in worldwide. The packages that I have used here are magrittr, tidyverse, scales, ggthemr, knitr, kableExtra, ggthemr and lubridate.

item.title: Week 31 : R and Package Downloads
item.description: Introduction Tidy Tuesday is a very good move to improve R programming for anyone who is interested in statistics. Data-sets are uploaded every Tuesday, and plots are published under the #tidytuesday. This is just me presenting a few accumulated plots for the data-set r-downloads.csv and r_downloads_year.csv. I shall be focusing on the data set provided on 2018 October 30th, Which is R and Package download stats. My main objective is to understand how Sri Lankan users have behaved in this data-set.

item.title: Website-fitODBOD: fitting Over Dispersed Binomial Outcome Data
GitHub-fitODBOD: fitting Over Dispersed Binomial Outcome Data
CRAN-fitODBOD: fitting Over Dispersed Binomial Outcome Data
R Package Development to Model Over Dispersed Binomial Outcome Data with the use of Binomial Mixture Distributions and Alternate Binomial Distributions.
